src:
Naslovne strane za ponedeljak, 4. novembar 2019. godine

04 Nov 2019, 06:10

Dnevne novine na naslovnim stranama od ponedeljka, 4. novembra najčešće pišu o dolasku specijalnog izaslanika SAD za Zapadni Balkan Metjua Palmera koji će se u Beogradu sastati sa predsednikom Srbije Aleksandrom Vučićem, kao i o pobedi srpskog tenisera Novaka Djokovića na masters turniru u Parizu.ALO  -  Pod naslovom "U Vladi sede ministri koji šuruju sa žutima" list piše da je danas "Dan D" za vladajuću koaliciju", jer Srpska napredna stranka na sednici predsedništva treba da raspravlja o vladajućem bloku.BLIC  -  "Tri razloga zbog kojih nas Amerika pritiska", o predstojećem sastanku Metjua Palmera i Aleksandra Vučića. "Djoković osvojio Pariz", o pobedi Djokovića na masters turniru u Parizu. "Srećna sam dok stojim na nogama", kaže glumica Mira Banjac koja puni 90 godina.VEČERNJE NOVOSTI  -  "Palmer pojačava pritisak na Beograd", o dolasku izaslanika SAD Metju Palmera u Beograd. "Nole opet zasijao u Gradu svetlosti", o pobedi tenisera Novaka Djokovića u Parizu. "Strahote Jasenovca uzdrmaće planetu", u Jerusalimu uskoro konferencija o strašnim ustaškim zločinima NDH.DANAS  -  "Ozbiljno smo zabrinuti za bezbednost novinara", kaže ministar spoljnih poslova Holandije Stef Blok. "Radnike namenske teraju da tuže Danas li Blic", list piše da rukovodstvo fabrike iz Lučana pritiska zaposlene. "Savez za Srbiju trenutno na 8,5 odsto", podaci su istraživanja Ipsos Stratedžikmarketinga.INFORMER  -  "Kreće bitka za Kosovo", o sastanku predsednika Srbije Aleksandra Vučića i američkog izaslanika za zapadni Balkan Metjua Palmera.KURIR  -  O današnjoj poseti specijalnog američkog izaslanika Beogradu list piše "Srbija neće trpeti poniženja".POLITIKA  -  "Ulazak desnice u trku za glasove", o učešću stranaka desne orijentacije na predstojećim parlamentarnim i lokalnim izborima. "Djoković osvojio peti masters u Parizu", o pobedi tenisera Novaka Djokovića. "Srbiji potreban institut za lečenje neplodnosti", piše list.SRPSKI TELEGRAF  -  List piše da ministar spoljnih poslova Ivica Dačić ima dogovor sa jednim od lidera opozicije Draganom Djilasom, pod naslovom "Srušiti Vučića do marta".
text:
Cover pages for Monday, November 4, 2019

04 Nov 2019, 06:10

Daily newspapers on the front pages of the Monday, November 4, most often write about the arrival of US Special Envoy for the Western Balkans Matthew Palmer to meet with Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic in Belgrade, as well as the victory of Serbian tennis player Novak Djokovic in a masters tournament in Paris.ALO - Entitled "Government Sitting With Yellow Ministers," the paper says that today is D-Day for the ruling coalition, as the Serbian Progressive Party presides over a ruling bloc at a presidency session.BLIC - "Three Reasons America is Pressing Us "about the upcoming meeting of Matthew Palmer and Alexander Vucic." Djokovic wins Paris ", about Djokovic winning the masters tournament in Paris." I'm happy while I'm on my feet, "says actress Mira Banjac, who is 90. EVENING NEWS -" Palmer is stepping up pressure on Belgrade, "on the arrival of US envoy Matthew Palmer to Belgrade." Nole shone again in the City of Light, "on the victory of tennis player Novak Djokovic in Pa "Jasenovac's horrors will shake the planet," a conference on the horrible Ustasha crimes NDH is about to take place in Jerusalem. TODAY - "We are seriously concerned about the safety of journalists," says Dutch Foreign Minister Stef Blok. "Dedicated workers are being sued to sue Danas Blic," the newspaper writes that the management of the Lučani plant is pressuring employees. "Alliance for Serbia currently at 8.5 percent," according to Ipsos Strategic Marketing Research.INFORMER - "The Battle for Kosovo is Going," on the Meeting between Serbian President Alexander Vucic and US Western Balkans Envoy Matthew Palmer.KURIR - Today's Visit of US Special Envoy Belgrade newspaper reads "Serbia will not suffer humiliation". POLITICS - "Entering the Right in the Vote Race", on the participation of right-wing parties in the upcoming parliamentary and local elections. "Djokovic wins fifth masters in Paris", about the victory of tennis player Novak Djokovic. "Serbia needs an institute for infertility treatment," the newspaper writes. SERBIAN TELEGRAPH - The newspaper writes that Foreign Minister Ivica Dacic has an agreement with one of the opposition leaders, Dragan Djilas, entitled "Topple Vucic by March."
